title: Enforcer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, if the Cult Leader is attacked, the attack will be redirected to you. You have 3 uses of this ability.
- At night, pray to Mithras, granting every Cult member Basic defense. You have 1 use of this ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role is converted from Town Protective members.
- If you die from any attack, all Cult members get an extra use of their ability.

desc:
Post 962
*You have traded your life to keep the vessel of Mithras and Corax alive. Ensure that your stories are shared, lest you not die in vain.*

You may only perform one ability per phase.
